- [ ] `patch` â€” Bug Fix
- [ ] `minor` â€” New Feature
- [ ] `major` â€” Breaking Change
- [ ] `dependencies` â€” Dependency Update[^1]
- [ ] `documentation` â€” Changes to the documentation only[^2]
- [ ] `tests` â€” Changes to any test code only[^2]
- [ ] `internal` â€” Any other changes that don't affect the published package[^2]

[^1]: publishes a `patch` release, for devDependencies use `internal`
[^2]: will not publish a new version
